Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Fluoride Blood Collection Tubes
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer® Fluoride Blood Collection Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer® Fluoride Blood Collection Tubes for collection, containment, preservation, transportation, and centrifugation of venous blood specimens for in vitro diagnostic testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Evacuated, sterile, single-use blood collection tubes with Sodium Fluoride/Potassium Oxalate or Sodium Fluoride/Na2EDTA for collecting, containing, preserving, transporting, and centrifuging venous blood specimens for glucose and lactate determinations in in vitro diagnostic testing.
